Member Function Documentation

boost::program_options::options_description_easy_init votca::tools::Application::AddProgramOptions ( const string &  group = ""  ) 

add option for command line

Parameters:
group group string
Returns:
easy_init of boost, see documentation
Adds an option to the available command line options. If no group is specified, it is added to the standard group (Allowed Options). If group is given, a sub group for this set of options will be created.

Definition at line 85 of file application.cc.

void votca::tools::Application::CheckRequired ( const string &  option_name,
const string &  error_msg = "" 
)

Check weather required option is set.

Parameters:
option_name name of the option
error_msg error message if option is missing
CheckRequired is called from EvaluateOptions if a required options is set. If not, the list of possible options is shown and an exception with the error messig given in error_msg is thrown

Definition at line 124 of file application.cc.

virtual bool votca::tools::Application::EvaluateOptions ( void   )  [inline, virtual]

Process command line options.

Returns:
true to contine, false to stop
EvaluateOptions is called by Run after parsing the command line. return true if everything is ok, false to stop and show help text.

Reimplemented in votca::csg::CsgApplication, CsgDensityApp, CGForceMatching, GmxTopolApp, CsgMapApp, and CsgStatApp.

virtual void votca::tools::Application::Initialize ( void   )  [inline, virtual]

Initialize application data.

Initialize is called by run before parsing the command line. All necesassary command line arguments can be added here

Reimplemented in votca::csg::CsgApplication, CsgTestApp, CsgTestApp, CsgBoltzmann, CsgDensityApp, CsgDumpApp, CGForceMatching, GmxTopolApp, CsgMapApp, and CsgStatApp.

virtual void votca::tools::Application::Run ( void   )  [inline, virtual]

Main body of application.

Run is called after command line was parsed + evaluated. All the work should be done in here.

Reimplemented in votca::csg::CsgApplication, and CsgBoltzmann.

Definition at line 38 of file application.cc.

void votca::tools::Application::StopExecution (  )  [inline]

call StopExecution after EvaluateOptions

This is usefule if the program executes an operation in EvaluateOptions and then wants to stop execution successfully. Call StopExecution and return true in EvaluateOptions.
